title: lmod generation with multiple compiler definitions using same compiler path fails for first definition
body:
We have two compiler definitions for the same compiler install so that different sets of cxxflags can be used. Generating lmod files for packages built with the first compiler defintion fails.

compilers.yaml:

- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: rhel7
    paths:
      cc: /home/gartung/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-6.4.0-vg3iy5rdxcj2mnnohcnn2ogioasheuos/bin/gcc
      cxx: /home/gartung/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-6.4.0-vg3iy5rdxcj2mnnohcnn2ogioasheuos/bin/g++
      f77: /home/gartung/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-6.4.0-vg3iy5rdxcj2mnnohcnn2ogioasheuos/bin/gfortran
      fc: /home/gartung/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-6.4.0-vg3iy5rdxcj2mnnohcnn2ogioasheuos/bin/gfortran
    spec: gcc@6.4.0
    target: x86_64
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags:
      cxxflags: '-std=c++17'
    modules: []
    operating_system: rhel7
    paths:
      cc: /home/gartung/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-6.4.0-vg3iy5rdxcj2mnnohcnn2ogioasheuos/bin/gcc
      cxx: /home/gartung/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-6.4.0-vg3iy5rdxcj2mnnohcnn2ogioasheuos/bin/g++
      f77: /home/gartung/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-6.4.0-vg3iy5rdxcj2mnnohcnn2ogioasheuos/bin/gfortran
      fc: /home/gartung/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-6.4.0-vg3iy5rdxcj2mnnohcnn2ogioasheuos/bin/gfortran
    spec: gcc@6.4.0-1
    target: x86_64

Session where error is reproduced.

[gartung@gartung ~]$ spack -d module refresh --delete-tree -m lmod patchelf
==> READ LOCK: /home/gartung/spack/opt/spack/.spack-db/lock[0:0] [Acquiring]
==> READ LOCK: /home/gartung/spack/opt/spack/.spack-db/lock[0:0] [Acquired]
==> READ LOCK: /home/gartung/spack/opt/spack/.spack-db/lock[0:0] [Released]
==> You are about to regenerate lmod module files for:

-- linux-rhel7-x86_64 / gcc@4.8.5 -------------------------------
xuekuii patchelf@0.9

-- linux-rhel7-x86_64 / gcc@6.4.0 -------------------------------
u54e2uh patchelf@0.9

-- linux-rhel7-x86_64 / gcc@6.4.0-1 -----------------------------
j52vdz2 patchelf@0.9

==> Do you want to proceed? [y/n] y
==> Regenerating lmod module files
==> 	WRITE: patchelf@0.9%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 /xuekuii [/home/gartung/spack/share/spack/lmod/linux-rhel7-x86_64/Core/patchelf/0.9-xueku.lua]
==> Reading config file /home/gartung/spack/etc/spack/compilers.yaml
==> 	WRITE: patchelf@0.9%gcc@6.4.0 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 /u54e2uh [/home/gartung/spack/share/spack/lmod/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc/6.4.0/patchelf/0.9-u54e2.lua]
==> Warning: Could not write module file [/home/gartung/spack/share/spack/lmod/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc/6.4.0/patchelf/0.9-u54e2.lua]
==> Warning: 	--> Compiler configuration contains entries with duplicate specification (gcc@6.4.0, linux-rhel7-x86_64) in the following files:
	/home/gartung/spack/etc/spack/compilers.yaml: 2 times <--
==> 	WRITE: patchelf@0.9%gcc@6.4.0-1 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 /j52vdz2 [/home/gartung/spack/share/spack/lmod/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc/6.4.0-1/patchelf/0.9-j52vd.lua]
